2D SPACE SHOOTER.title: 2D Space Shooter
2D SPACE SHOOTER.descr: Final Project for Videogames Design and Development course at Deusto School.

ZORK.title: ZORK!
ZORK.descr: Master's degree admission test. A classical text-based RPG adventure. Will you be able to escape the house?

TESSERACT.title: TESSERACT ENGINE
TESSERACT.descr: Fully fledged 3D Engine created in my Master's degree. (Includes all the features that one would expect from a professional Engine!).

SHUTDOWN.title: SHUTDOWN
SHUTDOWN.descr: Master's degree final project. A twin-stick shooter game with an innovative character-swapping mechanic.

MOBILE SPACE SHOOTER.title: 3D SPACE SHOOTER
MOBILE SPACE SHOOTER.descr: A classic space shooter created with Unity. Exercise on Pools, Persistent data and Leaderboards.

GOYA'S NIGHTMARE.title: Goya's Nightmare
GOYA'S NIGHTMARE.descr: IV Cultura Abierta GameJam. A Slenderman-type game based on the art of Goya's 'Dark Paintings'. FEAR THE CULTURE!

FOREST MASNION.title: Forest Mansion
FOREST MASNION.descr: A small puzzle platformer game with DonkeyKong mechanics but cute environ. A Unity's 2D mode exercise made in 4 days.

UGLY.title: Ugly
UGLY.descr: My first professional project! A 2D puzzle-platformer with an innovative Mirror mechanic. Releases on Steam, NSwitch and XBox.

ZITRO.title: Zitro
ZITRO.descr: In my time at Zitro, our team focused on developing slots games such as Pearl's Paradise, Fairyland Quest, Merging Fu Pots, OctoGold among many others.
